du·et

100 million Americans are lonely.
Are you?

Talk to someone.

90% of Americans have mobile phones.
61% have smartphones.

1 in 10 don't have a single friend.
1 in 5 don't feel loved.
1 in 3 are lonely.

It doesn't have to be like this.
Try Duet and talk to someone in your shoes today.

Our Mission

We provide a safe, anonymous online space where people can meet complete strangers for a five minute conversation.

Practice speaking. Practice listening.
Make a connection.
Or just talk about your day.

The only way to become more comfortable speaking is to speak with someone.

Try Duet

We're not quite ready yet!
Give us your email and we'll tell you when we're all set.

Contact Us

We're two guys trying to help people practice speaking with each other again.

Feel free to email us to provide some feedback, give us suggestions, or to just say hello!
